name: opencode-context
description: Semantic code search with ranked file matches and contextual line snippets showing exactly where matches occur. Available as CLI and OpenCode plugin.

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outfile ./dist/index.js --target node && bun build ./src/plugin.ts --outfile ./dist/plugin.js --target node && bun build ./src/install.ts --outfile ./dist/install.js --target node && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - ./dist/index.js > temp && mv temp ./dist/index.js && chmod +x ./dist/index.js
scripts.postinstall: node dist/install.js || echo 'Run: bunx opencode-context@latest install'
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run build:types
